程序包 net.neoforged.neoforge.event.tick

类 PlayerTickEvent

java.lang.Object
net.neoforged.bus.api.Event
net.neoforged.neoforge.event.entity.EntityEvent
net.neoforged.neoforge.event.entity.living.LivingEvent
net.neoforged.neoforge.event.entity.player.PlayerEvent
net.neoforged.neoforge.event.tick.PlayerTickEvent
直接已知子类:
PlayerTickEvent.Post, PlayerTickEvent.Pre
public abstract class PlayerTickEvent extends PlayerEvent
Base class of the two player tick events.

These events are separate from

引用无效 
LivingTickEvent
due to the semantics of player ticks. On the client, players tick from the usual Entity.tick() method, but on the server, they rely on ServerPlayer.doTick() which is called from ServerGamePacketListenerImpl.tick().

Use of these events should only be necessary if you rely on this specific timing.

另请参阅:
  • PlayerTickEvent.Pre
  • PlayerTickEvent.Post

  • 嵌套类概要

    嵌套类
    修饰符和类型
    类
    说明
    static class 
    PlayerTickEvent.Post
    PlayerTickEvent.Post is fired once per game tick, per player, after the player performs work for the current tick.
    static class 
    PlayerTickEvent.Pre
    PlayerTickEvent.Pre is fired once per game tick, per player, before the player performs work for the current tick.
